articles.title: Apple’s new widget puts Election Day updates on your Lock Screen and Home Screen - TechCrunch
articles.description: It's Election Day in the U.S., which means you're likely glued to the latest news about which presidential candidate is currently in the lead. To help
articles.content: It’s Election Day in the U.S., which means you’re likely glued to the latest news about which presidential candidate is currently in the lead. To help with this, Apple has released a Live Activities … [+2092 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Metal Slug Tactics is an odd mix of arcade shooter and grid strategy that works - Ars Technica
articles.description: Fusing the look and feel of the classic 2D shooter series to the painstaking planning of an isometric tactics game? Yeah, okay, it somehow plays.
